responses: You can visit our website for more info: www.sbmp.ac.in

patterns: Who is the Principal Of S B M Polytechnic?
Who is the Principal Of S B M P?
responses: Dr. Mohd. Zafar Shaikh is the Principal of Shri Bhagubhai Mafatlal Polytechnic.

patterns: Who is the Vice-Principal Of S B M Polytechnic?
Who is the Vice-Principal Of S B M P?
responses: Mrs. N.G.Kadukar is the Vice-Principal of Shri Bhagubhai Mafatlal Polytechnic.

patterns: Who is the Head of Computer Department?
Who is the HOD of Computer Department?
Who is the HOD of CSE Department?
Who is the HOD of Computer Department?
responses: The Head Of Department Of Computer Department is Shri J.S.Kulkarni.
The HOD Of Computer Department is Shri J.S.Kulkarni.

patterns: What is the Vision Of Computer Engineering Department?
What is the Vision Of CSE Department?
responses: To create a sustainable academic environment to produce highly competent computer professionals.

patterns: What is the Mission Of Computer Engineering Department?
What is the Mission Of CSE Department?
responses:
1. To expose students to latest tools and technologies in computing.
2. To keep faculties in tune with current professional demands by adequate training and higher studies.
3. To Adapt to rapid advancements in the computing by engaging students in the lifelong learning.
4. To incorporate sound ethical moral and social values amongst students for benefit of the society.

patterns: Who is the Head of Information Technology Department?
Who is the HOD of Information Department?
responses: The H O D Of Information Technology Department is Shri A.B.Dongaonkar.
The Head Of Department Of Information Technology Department is Shri A.B.Dongaonkar.

patterns: What is the Vision Of Information Technology Department?
What is the Vision Of IT Department?
responses: To create a vibrant environment that nurtures logical thinking, dynamism and innovation to transform students into competent IT professionals.

patterns: What is the Mission Of Information Technology Department?
What is the Mission Of IT Department?
responses:
1. To offer high quality, up-to-date knowledge through curriculum, infrastructure and teaching learning process in IT field.
2. To equip students with latest skills in the field of technologies supplemented with Practical Oriented approach to face ever evolving challenges in IT industry.
3. To facilitate faculty members to keep pace with rapid development through training and higher education, mutually benefitting students and staff.
4. To develop healthy interaction between faculty, students and industry professionals.
5.To instil ethical values combined with winning attitude contributing to the welfare of the society while being committed to Life-long Learning.

patterns: Who is the Head of Digital Electronics Department?
Who is the HOD of Digital Electronics?
Who is the Head of DE Department?
Who is the HOD of DE Department?
responses: For currently Head Of Digital Electronics is Mrs. A.A.Kulkarni.

patterns: What is the Vision of Digital Electronics?
Vision of Digital Electronics?
responses: We aspire to develop technically skilled manpower in the field of Digital Electronics.

patterns: What is the Mission of Digital Electronics?
Mission of Digital Electronics?
responses:
1: To design need based curriculum.
2: To provide advanced laboratory set-up.
3: To maintain industry-institute liaison.
4: To train faculty and staff to accept challenges in rapidly changing socio-technical environment.
5: To imbue students with soft skills, entrepreneurial qualities, ethics and lifelong learning.

patterns: What is the Vision of Chemical Department?

Vision of Chemical Department?
responses: Empower potential, through excellence in need based chemical engineering education.

patterns: What is the Mission of Chemical Department?
Mission of Chemical Engineering?
responses:
1. To impart need based chemical engineering knowledge through relevant curriculum.
2. To prepare employable personnel and entrepreneurs through industry-institute interaction.
3. Enrich departmental infrastructure and facilities.
4. To inculcate sense of discipline, responsibility towards society and promote lifelong learning.

patterns: What is the Vision of Mechanical Department?

patterns: What is the Vision of S.B.M.Polyetechnic?
What is the Vision of SBMP?
responses: SBM Polytechnic aspires to be the lead institute in providing need based technical education.

patterns: What is the Mission of S.B.M.Polyetechnic?
What is the Mission of SBMP?
responses:
1. To provide state-of-the-art infrastructure and latest equipments for providing a stimulating learning environment.
2. To prepare students to meet the dynamic needs of the industry by periodic reviewing and upgradation of curriculum through an interactive process with industry.
3.To inculcate a spirit of excellence in terms of academic performance, research and innovation in faculty by providing appropriate support and incentive systems.
4. To promote and support Co-Curricular, extra-curricular activities and industry interaction to make students socially sensitive and employable.

patterns: What are the Documents required for taking Admission in SBMP?
What are the Documents required?
What are the Documents required for students?
responses:
Documents required for taking admission in SBMP are
  • Original S.S.C/H.S.C Marksheet
    • 1,
  • Original VIII, IX Marksheets or Proforma 'Z'
  • Aadhar Card (True Copy)
  • Original Domicile Certificate
  • Original Caste Certificate
  • Original Exam Hall Ticket (For CBSE Students)
  • Original Gap Certificate (If Required)
  • Two Passport Size Photos

patterns: How to apply for admission in SBMP?
How to apply for admission in S B M Polytechnic?
How to apply for admission after 10th?
How to start eith admission after 12th?
How to apply for admission after SSC?
How to apply for admission after HSC?
responses:
SBM Polytechnic is a Gujrathi speaking Linguistic Minority institution. As per the rules 50% of the intake are reserved for the candidate belonging to Gujrathi speaking Linguistic community. Remaining 50% are available for the non Gujarathi ie General category candidates.
The admission details will be published on official website after SSC/HSC Result declaration.
The aspirant are advised to refer admission prospectus and the MSDTE website for details.

patterns: Is SBMP an autonomous college?
Is SBMP an autonomous institute?
responses: Yes, Shri Bhagubhai Maafatlal Polytechnic is an autonomous institute which designs its own curriculum as per the current trends in the industry.

patterns: Any new course to be introduced in S B M Polytechnic?
What is the new course Computer Engineering (Data Science)?
responses: From 2020, SBMP is offering a new programme in Cutting Edge Technology : Diploma in Computer Engineering (Data Science) with an intake of 60.

patterns: List of Placement Industries after graduating from SBMP?
What is the Placement Process after Diploma
Does SBMP offers placements after completing Diploma?
responses:
Most of the students prefer to go for Higher Education after Diploma. All the students who opt for jobs after completion of Diploma are provided special soft skill training and placed for jobs through campus recruitment process. Some of the Placement Industries are :
L & T Ltd, .B.A.R.C., Mahindra and Mahindra Ltd., Tata Motors Ltd., HOCL, TCS Ltd., TCE Ltd., ABB, Air India, Jet Air, Siemens, MSEB, Reliance Energy, Pidilite, etc

patterns: Where will the Online Classes Be Conducted ?
On which medium will Online Classes Start ?
responses: Online Classes will be conducted from 12th August on Microsoft Teams
